translations.translation: He said, 'Even if I were to bring you something undeniable?'
(Moses) said: "Even though I have brought to you something convincing?"
Moses said: "Even if I were to bring a Clear Sign to you?"
Moses asked, "What if I were to bring you clear proof (of the existence of God)?"
Said Moosa, “Even if I bring to you something clear?”
He said: "Even if I bring you something manifest"
He said: What! even if I bring to you something manifest?
He said, 'What, even though I brought thee something so manifest?'
He said: Even though I show thee something plain?
and Moses asked, "Even if I show you a clear sign?"
He said: even though I bring unto thee something manifest?
He said, ‘What if I bring you something [as an] unmistakable [proof]?’
(Moses) said: "Even if I showed you something clear (and) convincing?"
Musa (Moses) said: "Even if I bring you something manifest (and convincing)?"
What, even if I brought you something clear' said he (Moses).
He said, “What if I bring you something convincing?”
[Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"
[26:30] He, Moses, said, to him: ‘What, would you do this even, if I bring you something manifest?’, patent proof of my Mission?
(He said) Moses said: (Even though I show thee) Pharaoh (something plain) a sign that serves as proof for what I say?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمع موسى تهديده وعتوه { قَالَ } مستفهماً على سبيل التعجيز والغلبة: { أَ } تفف ما هددتني به { وَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ } أيها الطاغي المتجبر { بِشَيءٍ } أي: بمعجزةٍ { مُّبِينٍ } [الشعراء: 30] ظ اهر الدلالة على صدقي في دعواي
